Talk_1202:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Now, about that <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>
It would be good if we could meet it too.
Maybe if one of us captured it...
Talk_310:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>So, you've come around here in search
of that <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>, right?<sp:5:0:0> Or is
it that <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff> you're after?
Talk_1203:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>The god of horses, found at last...<sp:5:0:0> Now,
maybe one of us will have luck capturing
that <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Th-<sp:5:0:0>there's no mistaking it!


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>That's the giant white stallion we've
been trying to research!

<sp:3:0:2:0001>We've been studying the ecology of all
the wild animals in this area, but that
horse is the most interesting to us!
We'd heard of this exceptional creature
and came to try to capture it for a short
time to study its traits.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Ease_01>Now, seeing it this close up, that horse
is just so...<sp:5:0:0>intimidating!<sp:5:0:0> Its sheer
presence is...
Well, words fail me.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>I can say this for sure. What we call a
mutation—a new term in our work—must
be the cause of such surprising size!
Talk_102: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>Time for a break.<sp:5:0:0> A little rest will do.
Talk_300:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Hey there!<sp:5:0:0> Are you looking for that
<clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>? Or is it the <clr:0000>god
of horses<clr:ffff> you seek?
Talk_103: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>*sigh* Finally, time for a good rest!
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I knew it. You're seeking the <clr:0000>horse god<clr:ffff>.
Or...<sp:5:0:0>is it the <clr:0000>giant white stallion <clr:ffff>you seek?
Talk_301:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>There's a legend around these parts
about a god of horses.

<sp:3:0:2:0501>They say this god can restore life to
dead horses.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>It's only a legend though—and a legend
about a god seems like it could be a
slippery thing.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Really, it's Jini there you want to talk to
if you'd like to know more.

So, feel free to huddle around the fire
there if you'd like to pass the time until
he wakes up!
Talk_104:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>That's about it for resting up. <sp:5:0:0>I should
take over the watch from Straia.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>You have come here to look for the
<clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>, right?<sp:5:0:0> Or maybe it's
the <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff> you're looking for?
Talk_302:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>Well, that god of horses is fine and all,<sp:5:0:0> but
I want to catch the <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>.
Talk_105:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Aaand rest time is over!<sp:5:0:0> Ready to put in a
good day's work!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>It's like I said...<sp:5:0:0>there's an enormous white
horse <clr:0000>deep within this valley<clr:ffff>. You won't
believe your eyes!
Talk_303:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Still, once we catch that horse, I'd also
like to start that investigation into the
<clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff>.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Yes, yes.<sp:5:0:0> I know.<sp:5:0:0> Our research into the
giant white stallion is paramount.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But if there's a <clr:0000>horse god<clr:ffff> somewhere,
I really want to know about it.
Talk_3100:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS>Oh! You...<sp:5:0:0>met the horse god?!


H-<sp:5:0:0>hey!<sp:5:0:0> Get up, Straia!<sp:5:0:0> This is no time
to sleep!
Talk_2000:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What did you say?<sp:5:0:0> Do you mean to tell
me, you've met the horse god?

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Oh, hmm, I see...<sp:5:1:0> Yes, yes...
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There's been strange talk for a good
while about a horse god—one that lives
here, among us.
I believe it's more than just legend, or
at least I hope so.<sp:5:0:0> It's said this god can
bring horses back from the dead.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>That all might seem laughable,
even preposterous.

But my friend and I study horses, and
if such a god exists here and can
resurrect horses...
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Then what about...<sp:5:0:0>ancient horses? The
mind reels at the possibilities.

I'm willing to suspend my disbelief in
horse gods for the sake of ancient
research. So, my search goes on.
Talk_2002:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>I don't believe it.<sp:5:0:0> The legend is real.


<sp:3:0:2:0000>And is it true...<sp:5:0:0>that the god can resurrect
a horse from the dead?
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>But there's a complication...<sp:5:0:0>


They say this god moved—that he was
here but vanished.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Fortunately, tales of the horse god also
abound in distant Akkala.

It's looking more and more likely that
the god is not here, if he exists at all.
He could be somewhere in Akkala.
Talk_2200:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Whaaat?<sp:5:0:0> Really? Wake up, Jini!<sp:5:0:0> You don't
want to miss this!
Talk_2003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Well then, I can't help thinking...


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0901>Shall I eat you?<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Those words are worrisome.<sp:5:0:0> How much
can we begin to trust a god that says
something like that? Hmm...
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad>As much as I've wanted to meet this god,<sp:5:0:0>
I'd say that we must be cautious.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Oh yes! My curiosity about this highly
notable horse has drawn me here.<sp:5:0:0> I've
seen it <clr:0000>deep within this valley<clr:ffff>.
I can verify that it lives up to the
description. It's giant! It's white!
And it's a stallion!<sp:5:0:0> Extremely rare.
Talk_2004:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>Right! Given we haven't captured the
giant white stallion yet, and haven't seen
it close up...<sp:5:0:0>that should be our priority.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The latest talk in our field of study calls
such rare traits a mutation.

We're doing research into the ecology of
all of the wild animals in this area.

Oh, that such a rare horse exists! We
want to study this creature and see its
unusual traits close up!
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>But as you can guess, the stallion is
very strong.

That marvelous creature refuses to have
anything to do with us. It escapes us
every time. It won't be tamed.
Talk_2005:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>Yes! We should focus our attention on
the habitat of the giant white stallion.<sp:5:0:0>
There's so much to study here!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Hey there!<sp:5:0:0> It's a remarkable day when we
see a traveler all the way out here.

So, I've got a pretty good guess what
brought you. You're searching for...<sp:5:1:0>

the <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>, right?
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>All right.<sp:5:0:0> If that giant white stallion takes
a liking to you, come back with it and
visit us, OK?<sp:5:1:0> We'd love to see it.
Talk_2006:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>Agreed, yes.<sp:5:0:0> The local habitat of the
giant white stallion gives us plenty to
research at this time.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal>No, no.<sp:5:0:0> If this fellow is of similar mind,
he's searching for more than that out
here in the wilds.
There's no doubt that he's really in
search of...<sp:5:0:0>

the <clr:0000>horse god<clr:ffff>.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Well then, good talking.<sp:5:0:0> We'd appreciate
it if you share with us anything more you
hear about the horse god.
Talk_1310:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>*sigh* The form and sheer muscle on
that creature is astounding.<sp:5:0:0> Truly, an
impressive horse.
At full stride, it must be able to throw off
monsters like they're nothing and still
just keep on galloping.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>So, young man.<sp:5:0:0> Tell me. You seek the
<clr:0000>horse god<clr:ffff>?
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>Waaait just a minute there. You're not
saying that WE are going to Akkala, are
you? Because we're not!
Our main research is here. We've got to
see that <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1311:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>That's one very large horse, no doubt
about it.

Its stamina must be considerable, given
the size of that animal!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS>He does not!<sp:5:0:0> A quick study of his face
gives him away.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>He's got the <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff> on
his mind, and who could blame him?
I'm right, <sp:5:0:0>right?
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>As we discussed earlier, the horse god
of legend may be living among us,
somewhere in this vast land.
The strange stories about this god
mention that he can resurrect a dead
horse—bring it right back to life.
Talk_1312:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:TalkPositive>You can tell that giant white stallion
has a giant temper to match.

I can't imagine that it listens to just
anyone. Training such a horse must
be like trying to quiet a storm!
Talk_1100:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>That giant white stallion truly is a
phenomenal creature.

I wish I could capture one of those and
ride it for a time. But I suppose...<sp:5:1:0>there's
just one such animal in the world.
Talk_1101:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Ease>The giant white stallion...


That such an animal exists...<sp:5:0:0> Then
perhaps so, too, does the horse god.
Talk_210:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>Have you come to find the <clr:0000>horse god<clr:ffff>
after all? Or are you searching for the
<clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>?
Talk_1300:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>So, young man...<sp:5:0:0> You aren't riding the
giant white stallion. What a shame.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>At any rate, how is everything going with
you?<sp:5:0:0> Learned anything more about the
<clr:0000>horse god<clr:ffff>?
Talk_1301:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Well, I see you're not riding the
giant white stallion. That's a pity.

It's always a treat to observe such a
dashing, magnificent animal!<sp:5:0:0> I'd love to
see that horse anytime you can manage it.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Anyway, what's happening in your travels
of late? Did you discover anything more
about the <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff>?
Talk_1303:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Well then...young man,<sp:5:0:0> anytime that you
and that giant white stallion ride up, it's
a remarkable sight.
You've done much for our research.<sp:5:0:0>
Consider us in your debt.

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>So, how are you today?<sp:5:0:0> Learn anything
more about the <clr:0000>horse god<clr:ffff>?
Talk_1304:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Hey there! I swear, it will never get old,
seeing you and the giant white stallion
gallop up.
We owe you our most gracious thanks
for everything you've done to further our
study of that animal's habitat.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Anyway! Please tell me!<sp:5:0:0> Have you
found out anything more about that
<clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff>, by any chance?
Talk_200:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>You there... Young man.<sp:5:0:0> Have you come
to search for the <clr:0000>horse god<clr:ffff>?

Or is it the <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff> you seek?
Talk_1305:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>Hmm... What is it, young man?<sp:5:0:0> Have
you come this way now looking for that
<clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>?
Talk_1306:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Hey there!<sp:5:0:0> Have you come back this way
to search for the <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>?
Talk_202:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>Right. It's a white horse, with an
unusually large body. We found it deep
inside this valley.
We've come to this place to study that
giant white stallion, and to do that, we
hope to capture it for a time.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>We've had no luck so far. That horse is
powerful and won't be caught easily.
At least, not by us.
Talk_1307:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>So...not riding the giant white stallion
today?<sp:5:0:0> What a shame. I would have liked
to see that incredible horse again.
Talk_203:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Indeed. If you learn anything about the
horse god, I'd be thankful if you'd return
to share it with us.
And if you have any luck with that
giant white stallion, of course. I wish
you good fortune in your travels.
Talk_1308:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> It looks like you're not traveling with
the giant white stallion right now.<sp:5:0:0> Well,
that's a pity.
That animal just couldn't be more dashing
and magnificent!<sp:5:0:0> I wouldn't mind seeing
that horse now and then.
Talk_204:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>Although...<sp:5:0:0>I'm sure Straia will insist that
we need to capture the <clr:0000>giant white
stallion<clr:ffff> first.
Talk_1309:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Think>Incredible. That is a big horse. I don't
think I'll ever feel anything but awe being
next to that animal.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>It's so big, in fact, that horse-riding
equipment just wouldn't fit its
immense frame.
Talk_205:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Let's give it a shot...<sp:5:0:0>but I still feel we're
better off looking for the <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff>.
Talk_2100: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>Whaaat?<sp:5:0:0> It...<sp:5:0:0>it can't be!<sp:5:1:0> Wake up, Jini!
Talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>We still haven't learned about what I am
personally searching for, however—the
horse god.
If you happen to find out anything about
such a god, I'd be thankful if you'd share
that with us.
Talk_2500:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>The horse god...<sp:5:0:0>sounds nothing like
what I imagined.

Terrifying...<sp:5:0:0>perhaps.
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Oh...what is it, young man?<sp:5:0:0> Have you
come looking for the <clr:0000>horse god<clr:ffff> after all?
Or maybe the <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>?
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>Th-<sp:5:0:0>there's no mistaking it!


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>That's the giant white stallion we've
been trying to research!

<sp:3:0:2:0401>Seeing it this close up, that horse is
just so...<sp:5:0:0>intimidating.<sp:5:0:0> It's so large!
I feel so small!
<snd:Ease_01>Words fail me.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>One thing I can say with certainty is
that a mutation is in play here. What
a discovery!
Talk_2501:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>I thought this god of horses might be of
some interest to us, but really,<sp:5:0:0> I want to
know more about the <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>.
We need to capture it for a time, just to
observe it close up.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'll admit that it's becoming a bit of
an...<sp:5:0:0>obsession!
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Hey there! <sp:5:0:0>So, you're here to search for
that <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>, eh? Or is your
heart set on that <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff>?
Talk_9000:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal>Did<sp:5:0:0> something pass by just now?<sp:5:0:0> Like a
wind rushing by...

<sp:3:0:2:0001>No. It's got to be my old eyes. <sp:5:0:0>Been
staring at the fire too long.
Talk_1200:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I could tell you're of like mind,<sp:5:0:0> being
interested in the <clr:0000>horse god<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_01>A horse of this size...<sp:5:0:0>capturing it must
have been hard, and riding it—next
to impossible.
Young man,<sp:5:0:0> you are remarkable.
Talk_9001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:QuestionNormal>Did I just see...<sp:5:0:0> It was like that giant
horse galloping right out of my dreams...

<sp:3:0:2:0001>No, no, no! Ridiculous!<sp:5:1:0> Just a dream.<sp:5:0:0>
Only a dream.
Talk_1201:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>I've encountered the giant white stallion.<sp:5:0:0>
Truth be told, I wouldn't mind a face to
face with the <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff> too.
Talk_9002:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal>Did<sp:5:0:0> something pass by just now?<sp:5:0:0> Like a
wind rushing by...

<sp:3:0:2:0001>No. Only my eyes playing tricks on me.
I've been staring too long at that fire
going out.
